author: Andreas
content:
White balanced IS real ðŸ™‚)

Well, I didn't do much to the image. The colors are about what was there. White balance is always arbitrary. Either the camera does it or you or Photoshop. You can go out and balance with gray cards, but in many situations it will look different from what you saw and remember to have seen (which again can be two different things). I've maxed out the histogram, darkened the left side, added some vignetting, ... and that's about all that I remember ðŸ™‚
